text: “rātriyada, dahavalada, sūryayāda, candrayāda, (deviyan gæna dænum diya hæki) ohugē sādhakayangen æti dæya vannēya. ebævin ættenma oba allāhvama namadinnan vaśayen siṭinnehu nam, sūryayāṭada (sujūd nokaranu). candrayāṭada sujūd nokaranu. mēvā utpādanaya kaḷē kavurunda, ohuṭama sujūd karanu” (yayida nabiyē! oba pavasanu mænava)
